Product title: Utopia Towels 6 Pack Premium Hand Towels Set, 16 by 28 inches, 100% Ring Spun Cotton, Ultra Soft and Highly Absorbent 600GSM Towels for Bathroom, Gym, Shower, Hotel, and Spa, Beige
Key Features: 6 Piece Hand Towel Set- The set comprises of 6 luxury hand towels each measuring 16 by 28 inches. | Terrific & Lifelong Quality - Our hand towels are weaved with top-quality 100% ring spun cotton making them fade-resistant and convenient. | Ideal Gift – Perfect for holidays, housewarming gifts, wedding gifts, Mother’s Day gifts, engagement gifts, bridal showers, birthdays, Christmas, and homecoming, this is a great gift for everyone on your shopping list. | Supple And Absorbent – The texture of the towel has a soft hand-feel while the composition enables it to be highly absorbent and durable. | Quality Tailored Just For You – To prevent unforeseen color discoloration, it is advised, to avoid the removal of the application of any form of cosmetics, facial creams, or scrubs directly with the towel.
comment 1: I purchased these towels for my reflexology business.  There on the larger size for hand towels and you can comfortably wrap a man size 14 foot.  I don’t use wet towels, I keep them in my towel warmer and use them as a warm wrap, so I can’t comment on the absorption of these.They are very soft and feel like good spa quality.  I got the dark gray and the color is perfect.  They wash nicely, I noticed reviews stating they create a lot of lint initially but I took a chance because the rest of the comments were great.  I washed before the first use and do not think it was “a lot” of lint. For brand new towels, it didn’t surprise me and they were still very fluffy and dense after washing.  I washed them alone, all 6 of them.  I attached a pic of the lint catcher to show.I plan on getting more to replace my old ones. - sleepy
comment 2: Like these towels! Washed as soon as arrived, no color change after wash, very absorbent, look great, nice and fluffy. I bought the gray color - velvet sheets
comment 3: Soft, absorbent, nice weight, dry quickly, beautiful color, great value for the money. - Awesome Possum
comment 4: While not the most luxurious towels, these are pretty decent. They dry well and retain moisture as they should. I use them to dry my face after cleansing and they are the perfect size for it. Despite their dark color, my face wash hasn’t caused any bleaching or color loss. - JNichole
comment 5: The towels are very, very nice. I am really enjoying them. They are soft easy to fold and they are big because I love the big ones. - Debra K Griffin
